main event: Sighting of a bright blue and red object with a blue tail-like appendage over the Hawaiian Islands
interesting points: The object was observed traveling at a high altitude of 300 to 400 feet.
The object accelerated and disappeared in seconds.
The object was moving in a northwesterly direction.
The sighting was recorded as part of Project Blue Book, a historical U.S. Air Force program that investigated unidentified flying objects (UFOs).
The report concluded that the object was likely a meteor flying over the Pacific Ocean.
sighted object: Bright blue and red object with blue tail-like appendage
photographs: No photographs included in the report
